[[Global Positioning System|GPS]], [[GLONASS]], [[Galileo (satellite navigation)|Galileo]], [[Quasi-Zenith Satellite System|QZSS]], [[BeiDou]] | related = [[iPhone 16 Pro|iPhone 16 Pro and 16 Pro Max]] | type = [[Smartphone]] | sim = {{ubl |Dual eSIM (US models) |Dual nano-SIM (mainland China and Hong Kong, Macau models) |nano-SIM and eSIM (worldwide except the US and China) }} }} {{iPhone models}} The '''iPhone 16 ''' and '''iPhone 16 Plus''' are [[smartphone]]s developed and marketed by [[Apple Inc.|Apple]]. They are the [[List of iPhone models|eighteenth]]-generation [[iPhone]]s, succeeding the [[iPhone 15|iPhone 15 and iPhone 15 Plus]]. The devices were unveiled alongside the higher-priced [[iPhone 16 Pro|iPhone 16 Pro and 16 Pro Max]] during the September 9, 2024 [[List of Apple Inc. media events|Apple Event]] at [[Apple Park]] in [[Cupertino, California]].{{Cite web |last1=Haslam |first1=Karen |last2=Macworld |date=September 9, 2024 |title=iPhone 16 (2024) complete guide: Launch date, features, specs and more |url=https://www.macworld.com/article/2007943/iphone-16-release-date-specs-price-features.html |access-date=September 11, 2024 |website=[[Macworld]] |language=en}} == History == The devices were unveiled during an event on September 9, 2024, marking the first time an iPhone release had been announced on a Monday.{{cite web |last1=Phelan |first1=David |title=iPhone 16 Release: Apple Confirms Special Event, On A Surprise New Date |url=https://www.forbes.com/sites/davidphelan/2024/08/26/apple-iphone-16-release-date-new-report-hones-in-on-precise-date/ |website=Forbes |access-date=12 September 2024 |language=en}} It is also the first iPhone to not include Apple stickers in the box, as Apple removed them for environmental reasons. Stickers can be included if a customer asks for them at an Apple Store.{{cite web|title=iPhone 16 Retail Box Contents No Longer Include Apple Stickers|url=https://www.redmondpie.com/iphone-16-retail-box-contents-no-longer-include-apple-stickers/|website=Redmond Pie}} == Design == Like the iPhone 15, the device features rounded edges, a slightly curved display, and back glass. == Material == The iPhone 16 is equipped with an aluminum design with a color infused glass back. === Display === The iPhone 16 and iPhone 16 Plus retain their screen sizes of 6.1 inches and 6.7 inches, respectively. They feature a full-edge screen design with slim borders.{{Cite web |title=Apple iPhone 16 - Full phone specifications |url=https://www.gsmarena.com/apple_iphone_16-13317.php |access-date=2024-11-12 |website=www.gsmarena.com}}{{Cite web |title=Apple iPhone 16 Plus - Full phone specifications |url=https://www.gsmarena.com/apple_iphone_16_plus-13316.php |access-date=2024-11-12 |website=www.gsmarena.com}} For more specifics, here is each individual display '''iPhone 16:''' 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display with a resolution of 2556x1179 pixels. '''iPhone 16 Plus:''' 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display with a resolution of 2796x1290 pixels. === Camera === [[File:Camera button test of iPhone 16 Ultramarine.jpg|thumb|200px|The camera button test of iPhone 16]] [[File:Back view of iPhone 16 Ultramarine.jpg|thumb|200px|Back view of iPhone 16]] iPhone 16 features a more refined dual-lens array on the back, with a 48 megapixel Fusion wide-angle lens and 12 megapixel ultra-wide lens. The cameras are now aligned vertically, similar to iPhone 12, instead of diagonally like on iPhone 15, enabling spatial video capture. There is also an improved Photographic Styles feature for real-time lighting and color adjustments, allowing specific tones and colors to be manipulated.{{Cite web |date=September 9, 2024 |title=iPhone 16 and iPhone 16 Plus |url=https://www.apple.com/iphone-16/ |access-date=October 28, 2024 |language=en}} === Colors === The iPhone 16 and 16 Plus come in five colors: Ultramarine, Teal, Pink, White, and Black.{{Cite web |last=Cooper |first=Gael |date=September 9, 2024 |title=iPhone 16 Brightens Up With New Ultramarine, Teal and Pink Color Choices |url=https://www.cnet.com/tech/mobile/iphone-16-brightens-up-with-new-ultramarine-teal-and-pink-color-choices/ |url-status=live |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240910011055/https://www.cnet.com/tech/mobile/iphone-16-brightens-up-with-new-ultramarine-teal-and-pink-color-choices/ |archive-date=September 10, 2024 |access-date=September 9, 2024 |website=[[CNET]] |language=en}} {| class="wikitable" |- ! Color !! Name |- | class="mw-no-invert" style="background-color: #9AADF6;" | || Ultramarine |- | class="mw-no-invert" style="background-color: #B0D4D2;" | || Teal |- | class="mw-no-invert" style="background-color: #F2ADDA;" | || Pink |- | class="mw-no-invert" style="background-color: #FAFAFA;" | || White |- | class="mw-no-invert" style="background-color: #3C4042;" | || Black |} === Hardware === The iPhone 16 and the iPhone 16 Plus use an [[Apple A18]] [[system on a chip]]. The chip is optimized for running [[Generative artificial intelligence]] and features a [[Neural Engine]] that is twice as fast as its predecessor. The iPhone 16 includes an updated 48-megapixel Fusion camera, the same resolution as the [[iPhone 15]], with 2 μm, quad pixel PDAF, sensor-shift OIS, 100% Focus Pixels, support for super-high-resolution photos (24MP and 48MP). It has a new ultrawide camera with a wider [[aperture]], automatic focus and 1.4 μm, 100% Focus Pixels.{{Cite web |last1=Field |first1=Hayden |last2=Capoot |first2=Ashley |last3=Leswing |first3=Kif |last4=Haselton |first4=Todd |date=September 9, 2024 |title=Here's everything Apple just announced: iPhone 16, iPhone 16 Pro, Apple Watch Series 10, AirPods 4 and more |url=https://www.cnbc.com/2024/09/09/apple-event-2024-live-updates-iphone-16-apple-watch-10.html |access-date=September 9, 2024 |website=CNBC |language=en}} All ‌iPhone 16‌ models have an improved thermal design. The main logic board has been updated, centralizing chip placement and optimizing the surrounding architecture. The recycled aluminum substructure dissipates heat for up to 30 percent higher sustained performance for gaming.{{cite web |date=September 9, 2024 |title=iPhone 16 is powered by A18 chip up to 30% faster than iPhone 15 |url=https://9to5mac.com/2024/09/09/iphone-16-is-powered-by-a18-chip-up-to-30-faster-than-iphone-15/| access-date=September 13, 2024| website=[[9to5Mac]]| language=en-US}} Every model in the iPhone 16 lineup has support for [[WiFi 7]].{{Cite web |last=Espósito |first=Filipe |date=September 9, 2024 |title=iPhone 16 lineup adds support for faster Wi-Fi 7 |url=https://9to5mac.com/2024/09/09/the-entire-iphone-16-lineup-adds-support-for-faster-wi-fi-7/ |access-date=September 11, 2024 |website=[[9to5Mac]] |language=en-US}} === Action Button === The iPhone 16 and iPhone 16 Plus come with the Action Button, first featured on the iPhone 15 Pro lineup. By default, the Action Button toggles silent mode. However, users can change the button's feature to do different things other than silent mode, like open the Camera app or toggle a focus mode. === Camera Control button === All iPhone 16 models now come with a new button called Camera Control. This button is on the right side of the device, and allows the user to open the camera app, switch between different camera controls and features, and taking photos and videos. The button can distinguish between light and hard presses. By pressing the button once, it opens the camera app. By lightly pressing it twice, it opens a small menu with different camera controls, such as zoom or tone. Pressing the button hard once takes a photo, while holding for a few seconds starts a video.{{Cite web |title=iPhone 16 and iPhone 16 Plus |url=https://www.apple.com/au/iphone-16/ |access-date=2024-09-21 |website=Apple (Australia) |language=en-AU}} === Battery and charging === The iPhone 16 has been upgraded in terms of battery capacity.{{cite web| date=September 9, 2024| title=iPhone 16 is powered by A18 chip up to 30% faster than iPhone 15 |url=https://9to5mac.com/2024/09/09/iphone-16-is-powered-by-a18-chip-up-to-30-faster-than-iphone-15/| access-date=September 13, 2024| website=[[9to5Mac]]| language=en-US}} The base iPhone 16 has video playback duration of up to 22 hours, while the iPhone 16 Plus has video playback up to 27 hours. The iPhone 16 has duration of audio playback up to 80 hours, 20% less than the iPhone 16 Plus with 100 hours of audio playback. The [[MagSafe (wireless charger)|MagSafe]] wireless charging standard has been refreshed with a longer cable as an option, allowing the iPhone 16 and iPhone 16 Plus to charge at a faster speed of 25W with a 30W power adapter. === Enclosure === The enclosure is made up of 85% recycled content. ==Software== {{main|iOS 18}} The iPhone 16 launched with iOS 18. While the device was announced alongside Apple Intelligence, these features were delayed until after release.{{Cite news |date=July 28, 2024 |title=Apple's artificial intelligence features to be delayed, Bloomberg News reports |url=https://www.reuters.com/technology/apples-artificial-intelligence-features-be-delayed-bloomberg-news-reports-2024-07-28/ |work=[[Reuters]]}} iOS 18 includes RecoveryOS on the iPhone 16 series that allows users to recover and restore [[firmware]] wirelessly using another iPhone.{{Cite web |last=Shivam |first=Harsh |date=September 18, 2024 |title=iPhone 16 allows wireless firmware recovery using another iPhone: Report |url=https://www.business-standard.com/technology/tech-news/iphone-16-allows-wireless-firmware-recovery-using-another-iphone-report-124091800692_1.html |website=Business Standard}} == Specifications == The iPhone 16 and 16 Plus have a vertical camera layout, similar to the [[iPhone 12]], as opposed to the diagonal layout for [[iPhone 13]], [[iPhone 14]], and [[iPhone 15]]. USB Type-C port is used, albeit with [[USB#USB 2.0|USB 2.0]] data transfer speeds up to 480 Mb/s.{{Cite web |last=Clover |first=Juli |date=September 9, 2024 |title=iPhone 16 USB-C Still Limited to USB 2, No Change for 16 Pro Either |url=https://www.macrumors.com/2024/09/09/iphone-16-usb-c-usb-2-speed/ |url-status=live |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240910011200/https://www.macrumors.com/2024/09/09/iphone-16-usb-c-usb-2-speed/ |archive-date=September 10, 2024 |access-date=September 9, 2024 |website=[[MacRumors]]}} == Other Features == '''Action Button''' - customizable button for quick access to various functions '''Water & Dust Resistance''' - Rated IP68 (maximum depth of 6 meters up to 30 minutes) '''Operating Systems''' - iOS 18 with Apple intelligence for enhanced privacy and productivity features. == Release and pricing == The iPhone 16 has a starting price of {{Usd|799|2024}}, while the iPhone 16 Plus starts at {{Usd|899|2024}}. Pre-orders began on September 13, 2024, and sales started September 20.{{Cite web |title=Apple iPhone 16, iPhone 16 Plus, iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max launched, Price and Specifications |url=https://www.androidcrunch.com/2024/09/09/apple-iphone-16-iphone-16-plus-iphone-16-pro-and-iphone-16-pro-max-launched-price-and-specifications/ |access-date=2024-09-13}} === Availability by region === {{Div col|colwidth=10em}} ; September 20, 2024 * [[Australia]] * [[Austria]] * [[Bahrain]] * [[Brazil]] * [[Belgium]] * [[Canada]] * [[China]] * [[Croatia]] * [[Czech Republic]] * [[Denmark]] * [[Finland]] * [[France]] * [[Germany]] * [[Greece]] * [[Hong Kong]] * [[Hungary]] * [[India]] * [[Italy]] * [[Ireland]] * [[Japan]] * [[Luxembourg]] * [[Malaysia]] * [[Mexico]] * [[Netherlands]] * [[New Zealand]] * [[Norway]] * [[Oman]] * [[Poland]] * [[Portugal]] * [[Qatar]] * [[Saudi Arabia]] * [[Serbia]] * [[Singapore]] * [[Slovakia]] * [[South Africa]] * [[South Korea]] * [[Spain]] * [[Sweden]] * [[Switzerland]] * [[Taiwan]] * [[Thailand]] * [[Turkey]] * [[United Arab Emirates]] * [[United Kingdom]] * [[United States]] ; September 26, 2024 * [[Israel]] ; September 27, 2024 * [[Macao]] * [[Vietnam]] * [[Malta]] ; October 18, 2024 * [[Bangladesh]] * [[Philippines]] {{Div col end}} ===Indonesian sales ban=== On October 20, 2024, the Indonesian [[Ministry of Industry (Indonesia)|Ministry of Industry]] announced a formal ban on the sale and use of iPhone 16 models in Indonesia, citing that Apple has not fulfilled their promised investments in the country, and failing to meet the 40% local content requirement threshold for certification.{{Cite news |date=2024-10-26 |title=Apple iPhone 16: Why is it off-limits in Indonesia? Here's what you need to know about the new ban |url=https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/industry/cons-products/electronics/apple-iphone-16-why-is-it-off-limits-in-indonesia-heres-what-you-need-to-know-about-the-new-ban/articleshow/114609198.cms |access-date=2024-10-29 |work=The Economic Times |issn=0013-0389}} Apple subsequently offered a $100 million investment in exchange for lifting of the ban, but the Ministry of Industry rejected this offer, stating that it "has not met principles of fairness"{{Cite news |date=2024-11-25 |title=Indonesia says Apple's $100 mln investment proposal inadequate |url=https://www.reuters.com/technology/indonesia-says-apples-100-mln-investment-proposal-inadequate-2024-11-25/ |access-date=2024-12-06 |work=[[Reuters]]}} and demanded a larger amount,{{Cite web |date=2024-11-22 |title=Apple expected to invest over US$100 mln, says ministry |url=https://en.antaranews.com/news/335417/apple-expected-to-invest-over-us100-mln-says-ministry |access-date=2024-12-06 |website=Antara News |language=en}} which later said to be at least $1 billion.{{Cite news |date=2024-12-03 |title=Indonesia expects $1 billion investment commitment from Apple in a week |url=https://www.reuters.com/technology/indonesia-expects-1-bln-investment-commitment-apple-a-week-minister-says-2024-12-03/ |access-date=2024-12-06 |work=[[Reuters]]}} == Reception == The iPhone 16 has received positive feedback for several aspects, but also shows a few limitations. The upgraded design is a favourite, bringing a refreshed aesthetic with the available vibrant color options, which feel more dynamic than past models. The display maintains Apple's Super Retina HDR quality, but is limited to a 60 Hz refresh rate, which some users find outdated compared to faster displays on cheaper competitor phones.{{Cite web |date=25 September 2024 |title=Apple iPhone 16 - Review 2024 - PCMag UK |url=https://uk.pcmag.com/mobile-phones/154506/apple-iphone-16 |access-date=2 November 2024 |website=PCMag UK}}{{Cite web |date=5 October 2024 |title=iPhone 16 review: Who needs the Pro? |url=https://www.digitaltrends.com/mobile/iphone-16-review/ |access-date=2 November 2024 |website=Digital Trends}} == References == {{reflist}} {{S-start}} {{S-bef | before = [[iPhone 15|iPhone 15 / 15 Plus]] }} {{S-ttl | title = [[iPhone]] | years = 18th generation }} {{S-inc|recent }} {{S-end}} {{iOS}} {{Apple hardware since 1998}} {{Apple Inc. hardware}} [[Category:IPhone]] [[Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2024]] [[Category:Products introduced in 2024]] [[Category:Mobile phones with 4K video recording]] [[Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras]] [[Category:Flagship smartphones]]
